p: Zanthoxylum armatum DC. was purchased from Xiluyuan Market (Liangxiang, China). Platycladi semen was provided by Beijing Keyuan Xinhai Pharmaceutical Business Co., Ltd. All samples were identified by Prof. CL of Beijing University of Chinese Medicine and stored at −20°C. A. flavus was isolated from the surface of platycladi semen and preserved with glycerol solution at −80°C ( Li T. et al., 2020). Aflatoxin standards were purchased from the Institute for Food and Drug Control (Beijing, China, lot no.: 61001-201703).
